author: Sleep Aromatherapy Oil Roller; Eucalyptus
description: A natural and fresh scent of Jasmine fragrance and Eucalyptus essential oil or Rose fragrance with Lavender essential oil. Spray in the shower to breathe in the freshness for optimal relaxation, on your linens to freshen, or your space to utilize its deodoriz
cleaned_text: Image 1 of 2 Image 2 of 2 Natural Aromatherapy Spray for Bath, Body, Linen $28.00 All natural Jasmine fragrance and Eucalyptus essential oil or Rose fragrance with Lavender essential oil anti-microbrial sprays. Spray in the shower to inhale the freshness of the essential oils for optimal relaxation, on your linens or furniture to deodorize, or on your self. Eucalyptus & Jasmine Ingredients: Organic Wild Harvested Witch Hazel, Organic Grain Alcohol, Jasmine fragrance, Eucalyptus essential oil, Chamomile Water Essential Hydrosol. Lavender & Rose Ingredients: Organic Wild Harvested Witch Hazel, Organic Grain Alcohol, Rose fragrance, Lavender essential oil, Chamomile Water Essential Hydrosol. Instructions: Spray in shower, over bedding, or on body. Shake well before using. Purchase plants a tree. Bath & Linen
